name: Investment & Life Assurance Group Limited
goal:
ILAG is a trade body representing members from the Life Assurance and Wealth Management Industries.

ILAG members share and develop their practical experiences and expertise, applying this practitioner knowledge to the development of their businesses, both individually and collectively, for the benefit of members and their customers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Review of EU legislation and implementation into UK legislation and regulations.
